summary: Diff implements a multi-page FitCoach frontend (Home/Tools/About/Contact) with shared header/footer layout, responsive styling/theme, tools (BMI/TDEE/workout planner with copy), document titles, and a Motoko backend for storing/listing contact inquiries. However, backend inquiry creation does not return an id/record as required, and generated static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (including required icon set) cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend method to create a new contact inquiry must return the created id (or created record).
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo implements submitInquiry(...) : async () and does not return an id or record.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (logo, hero banner, and referenced theme images).
missing_requirements.reason: UI references generated image paths, but the diff summary does not show any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so asset existence cannot be confirmed from provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include and render the required generated icon set (dumbbell, stopwatch, heart/health) from frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the shown files that the required icon set file exists or is rendered; only logo and hero banner are referenced in UI. (Assets may be in omitted files, but not verifiable from provided summary.)

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes a third-party attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request external attribution/marketing links in the footer.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend exposes an additional getInquiry(id) query method.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only required create and list methods for inquiries; single-record fetch was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Internet Identity authentication/provider and identity-aware actor creation even though authentication was not required for this request.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest states Internet Identity is the only supported auth but also notes it is not required for this request; implementing it is extra beyond requirements.
